src:
Pangandaran Diguncang Gempa Lagi, Nihil Potensi Tsunami
01 Nov 2019, 10:16 by Anwar Siswadi (Kontributor), Erwin Prima
TEMPO.CO, Bandung - Gempa tektonik kembali mengguncang Pangandaran dan sekitarnya. Lindu bermagnitudo 4,9 muncul Jumat sore, 1 November 2019, pukul 15.38 WIB. BMKG menyatakan gempa tidak berpotensi tsunami.
Staf BMKG Hendro Nugroho menginformasikan koordinat sumber gempa 8.16 LS - 107.89 BT. “Tepatnya berada di laut pada jarak 84 kilometer barat daya Kabupaten Pangandaran,” kata Kepala BBMKG Wilayah II Tangerang itu Jumat.
Sumber gempa berkedalaman 31 kilometer. Tergolong dangkal, gempa menurutnya akibat aktivitas di bagian intraslab lempeng Eurasia. Dampak gema berupa guncangan yang berskala intensitas I - II MMI di Pangandaran, Jawa Barat.
Gempa intraslab adalah lindu yang bersumber di bagian dalam zona subduksi. Lempeng ada yang pecah atau retak sehingga menimbulkan gempa.
Hingga pukul 16.10 WIB tidak ada gempa susulan maupun laporan kerusakan bangunan.
Sebelumnya Pangandaran dan sekitarnya diguncang gempa bermagnitudo 4,8 pada Kamis pagi, 31 Oktober 2019. Lindu bermagnitudo 4,8 itu terasa guncangannya ke Cilacap, Tasikmalaya, Garut, dan Ciamis.
BMKG mencatat gempa terjadi pukul 08.56 WIB. Lokasi sumber gempa berada di titik koordinat 8.23 LS - 108.25 BT. Tepatnya di laut berjarak 64 kilometer arah barat daya Kabupaten Pangandaran. BMKG Bandung melaporkan kedalaman sumber gempa itu 25 kilometer.
Gempa tergolong dangkal. Penyebabnya sama dengan yang terbaru yaitu akibat aktivitas gempa di intraslab lempeng Eurasia.
ANWAR SISWADI
text:
Pangandaran Shaken by Another Earthquake, Zero Potential Tsunami
01 Nov 2019, 10:16 by Anwar Siswadi (Contributor), Erwin Prima
TEMPO.CO, Bandung - Tectonic earthquake has again rocked Pangandaran and its surroundings. Lindu with a magnitude of 4.9 appeared Friday afternoon, November 1, 2019, at 15.38 WIB. BMKG said the earthquake had no tsunami potential.
BMKG staff Hendro Nugroho informed the coordinates of the source of the earthquake 8.16 LS - 107.89 East. "Precisely located at sea at a distance of 84 kilometers southwest of Pangandaran Regency," said the Head of BBM IIG Region II Tangerang on Friday.
The source of the earthquake was 31 kilometers deep. Relatively shallow, according to him the earthquake was caused by activity in the intraslab of the Eurasian plate. The impact of the echo in the form of shocks that scale the intensity I - II MMI in Pangandaran, West Java.
The intraslab earthquake is a lindu that originates inside the subduction zone. The plate is broken or cracked, causing an earthquake.
Until 16.10 WIB there were no aftershocks or building damage reports.
Earlier Pangandaran and its surroundings were shaken by an earthquake with a magnitude of 4.8 on Thursday morning, October 31, 2019. Lindu with a magnitude of 4.8 was shaken to Cilacap, Tasikmalaya, Garut, and Ciamis.
BMKG noted the earthquake occurred at 08.56 WIB. The location of the earthquake source is at the coordinates of 8.23 LS - 108.25 East. Precisely at sea is 64 kilometers southwest of Pangandaran Regency. BMKG Bandung reported the depth of the source of the earthquake was 25 kilometers.
The earthquake was classified as shallow. The cause is the same as the most recent one due to earthquake activity on the Eurasian plate intraslab.
ANWAR SISWADI
